title: Sprite Source Configuration
description: A config file that lives in the root of a sprite source directory. It sets the options used by the Stitch CLI `stitch add sprites` command.

prefix.description: A prefix to add to the source file names to get the sprite names.

postfix.description: A postfix to add to the source file names to get the sprite names.

case.description: Normalize the casing upon import. This ensures consistent casing of assets even if the source is either inconsistent or uses a different casing than intended in the game project.

flatten.description: By default each sprite resource is named by its final folder (e.g. a sprite at 'root/my/sprite' will be called 'sprite'). Use this flag to convert the entire post-root path to the sprite's name (e.g. 'root/my/sprite' will be called 'my_sprite' if using snake case).

exclude.description: The provided pattern will be converted to a RegEx using JavaScript's `new RegExp()` function. Any sprites whose *original* names match the pattern will not be imported.
